name: TheTaraOneShow
0:
”Alexa, open The Tara One Show”
”Alexa, start The Tara One Show”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the tara one show
Developer Terms of Use
des: This podcast will be about giving you more spiritual and insightful clarity that may resonated with your current situation. My Podcast will be about a variety topics such as spirituality, self help, life purpose, relationships by using the power of the tarot. “Tarot Love Soaps” podcast will help by giving you a new way at looking at things in your everyday life and hopefully it will be an insightful experience needed along your journey . I will give you spiritual insight along your journey through intuitive spiritual readings and mentoring and coaching consultations. You can tune in to “Tarot Love Soaps” on the spreaker app which is available on your android or ios device. For more topics on love and relationships coaching you can go to my new website at https://taraonelovecoach.com Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands: **Next/Previous Episode** — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next” — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous” **Select Latest Episode** — “Alexa, ask The Tara One Show to play latest episode” **Select First Episode** — “Alexa, ask The Tara One Show to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
